1→# Specification: Conform Site Design to Teaouse Design System
     2→
     3→## Overview
     4→
     5→Transform the Teaouse storefront from a generic Medusa e-commerce template into a calm, premium, illustrated tea brand experience. The implementation will apply the Teaouse Design System across all UI components, establishing consistent colors (Tea Green, Warm Wood, Cream Paper, Ink Brown), typography (Playfair Display for headings, Inter for body), and interaction patterns that embody the brand's philosophy of "ritual over speed, warmth over sharpness, and story over noise."
     6→
     7→## Workflow Type
     8→
     9→**Type**: feature
    10→
    11→**Rationale**: This is a comprehensive design system implementation requiring coordinated changes across configuration files, global styles, and multiple UI components. It introduces new visual patterns rather than modifying existing business logic, making it a feature implementation that builds upon the existing Medusa starter template.
    12→
    13→## Task Scope
    14→
    15→### Services Involved
    16→- **main** (primary) - Next.js storefront application where all design changes will be implemented
    17→
    18→### This Task Will:
    19→- [ ] Configure Tailwind CSS with Teaouse design tokens (colors, typography, border-radius, shadows)
    20→- [ ] Import and configure Google Fonts (Playfair Display, Inter, Caveat)
    21→- [ ] Update global CSS with design system base styles
    22→- [ ] Transform navigation header to wood-toned, calm aesthetic
    23→- [ ] Update footer with design system colors and typography
    24→- [ ] Redesign hero section with Teaouse branding
    25→- [ ] Apply card styles with soft shadows and paper/wood tones
    26→- [ ] Update form inputs with design system styling
    27→- [ ] Update modals with rounded corners and soft styling
    28→- [ ] Update buttons and interactive links with Tea Green accent
    29→- [ ] Replace generic "Medusa Store" branding with "Teaouse"
    30→- [ ] Remove all sharp corners and high-contrast elements
    31→
    32→### Out of Scope:
    33→- Adding new illustration assets or mascot images
    34→- Implementing animations beyond allowed fade-in and gentle slide
    35→- Database or backend changes
    36→- Adding new pages or routes
    37→- E-commerce functionality changes

    39→## Service Context

    41→### Main (Next.js Storefront)
    42→
    43→**Tech Stack:**
    44→- Language: TypeScript
    45→- Framework: Next.js
    46→- Styling: Tailwind CSS with @medusajs/ui-preset
    47→- Key directories: `src/app`, `src/modules`, `src/styles`, `src/lib`
    48→
    49→**Entry Point:** `src/app/layout.tsx`
    50→
    51→**How to Run:**
    52→```bash
    53→npm run dev
    54→```
    55→
    56→**Port:** 8000
    57→
    58→## Files to Modify
    59→
    60→| File | Service | What to Change |
    61→|------|---------|---------------|
    62→| `tailwind.config.js` | main | Add Teaouse color palette, typography, border-radius tokens |
    63→| `src/styles/globals.css` | main | Add font imports, CSS custom properties, base styles |
    64→| `src/app/layout.tsx` | main | Configure Google Fonts with next/font |
    65→| `src/modules/layout/templates/nav/index.tsx` | main | Apply wood-toned header, cream background, update branding |
    66→| `src/modules/layout/templates/footer/index.tsx` | main | Apply design system colors, update branding to "Teaouse" |
    67→| `src/modules/layout/components/side-menu/index.tsx` | main | Update menu panel colors to warm wood/cream palette |

   157→1. **Color System Implementation**
   158→   - Description: Implement the four primary UI colors and six secondary story colors as Tailwind design tokens
   159→   - Acceptance: All UI elements use the defined color palette; no pure white (#FFFFFF) or pure black (#000000) visible in UI

   166→   - Description: Transform header to horizontal, wood-toned navigation with cream background

   168→

   172→

   176→
   177→6. **Brand Update**
   178→   - Description: Replace "Medusa Store" branding with "Teaouse" throughout
